commands.name: az site-recovery network mapping create
commands.summary: Create operation to create an ASR network mapping.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery network mapping create --fabric-name
                                        --name
                                        --network-name
                                        --recovery-network-id
                                        --resource-group
                                        --vault-name
                                        [--fabric-details]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--recovery-fabric-name]
examples: az site-recovery network mapping create -g rg --fabric-name fabric1_name -n network_mapping1_name --network-name azureNetwork --vault-name vault_name --recovery-network-id vnet2_id --fabric-details '{azure-to-azure:{primary-network-id:vnetvm_id}}' --recovery-fabric-name fabric2_name

commands.name: az site-recovery network mapping delete
commands.summary: Delete operation to delete a network mapping.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery network mapping delete [--fabric-name]
                                        [--ids]
                                        [--name]
                                        [--network-name]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--subscription]
                                        [--vault-name]
                                        [--yes]
examples: az site-recovery network mapping delete -g rg --fabric-name fabric_source_name -n network_mapping_src_to_recovery_name --network-name azureNetwork --vault-name vault_name'

commands.name: az site-recovery network mapping list
commands.summary: List all ASR network mappings for the specified network.
examples: az site-recovery network mapping list -g rg --fabric-name fabric_source_name --network-name azureNetwork --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery network mapping show
commands.summary: Get the details of an ASR network mapping.
examples: az site-recovery network mapping show -g rg --fabric-name fabric_source_name -n network_mapping_src_to_recovery_name --network-name azureNetwork --vault-name vault_name

commands.name: az site-recovery network mapping update
commands.summary: Update operation to create an ASR network mapping.
commands.syntax:
az site-recovery network mapping update [--add]
                                        [--fabric-details]
                                        [--fabric-name]
                                        [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--ids]
                                        [--name]
                                        [--network-name]
                                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                        [--recovery-fabric-name]
                                        [--recovery-network-id]
                                        [--remove]
                                        [--resource-group]
                                        [--set]
                                        [--subscription]
                                        [--vault-name]
examples: az site-recovery network mapping update -g rg --fabric-name fabric_recovery_name -n network_mapping_src_to_recovery_name --network-name azureNetwork --vault-name vault_name --recovery-network-id vnetvm_id --fabric-details '{azure-to-azure:{primary-network-id:vnet_recovery_id}}' --recovery-fabric-name fabric_source_name
